DOC.brief_summary: Patients diagnosis HPIN enrol . Patients randomize two group : dutasteride treatment group watchful wait strategy group . According study protocol subject would undergo 10 core biopsy 6 , 12 , 24 , 36 month randomization . There assessed rate prostate cancer repeat transrectal ultrasound guide biopsy effect 5 alfa reductase inhibitor ( dutasteride ) prevention prostate cancer development patient high grade intraepithelial neoplasia ( HPIN ) .
